name: Breaking Snow
description:
Breaking Snow

A submission for the ACM Winter Game Jam 2022.

Quick note: When the empty arena looking area loads, immediately press 'E' because of a bug.

In the North Pole, Santa’s hat is stolen by greedy elves for its magical power, he must fight his way through these elves and figure out who the mastermind is behind it...

CONTROLS

WASD - Move
Mouse 1 - Shoot
E - Interact 

CREDITS

Programming by Lewis and Em

Design and Art by Dariia

Level Design by Jan

Story by Andrew

Music by Alfie

Voice Acting by Lewis and Dariia
